name: Void Crossing
description:
A 3D Traversal Indie Game.

Swing, Shoot, Bounce to the portal at the end of each level.

Finishing the game isn't easy, and after you've done that, try to speed run the entire game. Can you make it in less than 7 minutes?

Controls

  • Move - W, A, S, D
  • Jump - Spacebar
  • Reset - R
  • Menu - Esc

Tips

  • Tired of this level? You can always skip to the next using the menu.
  • Let go of the forward key - It will flatten your trajectory which causes lost of height and overall distance coverage

Having Issues?

Please email: itay.apps@gmail.com
